data.persona: I work in the village.  I enjoy hitting metal with my hammer.  I make fine armor and weapons.
data.description:
You are in the Outpost.
A simple outpost with 3 wooden buildings near the middle of the mountain. A bonfire in the middle with several wooden logs surrounding it. A barracks, Armory, and Dining Hall stands around the bonfire. A wooden wall surrounds the outpost.
There's a horseshoe, a wooden wall, a barrack, a bonfire, a horse, a log, a Dining Hall, and a Armory here.
The soldier and the enemy are here.

You are carrying a tongs.

data.short_motivation: I must find a way to travel to the front lines of the battle
data.mid_motivation: I must provide armor and weapons to the soldiers
data.long_motivation: I must make lots of gold in order to be able to make better and better armor and weapons

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get armor and weapons from my armory

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go front lines of the battle

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give weapons and armor to soldiers
